Home Features Support Resources About Us Login Sign Up
Content on this page requires a newer version of Adobe Flash Player.
Let your Friends and Colleagues know about us!
About GradeBookPortal
GradeBookPortal is an educational portal that is free for educational professionals to utilize to manage their class work online in a secure environment. The software is dedicated to remaining free and relevant with the changes in technology. Compare our features and functions to the subscription based applications that cost hundreds of dollars yearly. New Release Coming in January 2012
GradeBookPortal 2.0 will be released with a more robust and easier to use interface for administrators, teachers, students and parents. We have added more tools and utilities to better manage the gradebook. Stay tuned in for our release notes coming soon!
